Our studies offer a deeper understanding of prompt engineering thereby opening up avenues for research on the future of prompt engineering.
Our results suggest that prompt engineering is a learned skill that requires expertise and practice.
Researchers have been actively exploring different prompt engineering strategies, such as Chain of Thought (CoT), Zero-CoT, and In-context learning.
We conclude by speculating on four possible futures of prompt engineering.
